title: nArayaNa gOvinda hari
sahitya:
nArAyaNa gOvinda hari nArAyaNa gOvinda


anupallavi

  nArAyaNa gOvinda mukunda paratara paramAnanda


caraNam 1    modalu matsyanAgi udisi sOmana sadedu vEdagaLa tanda
    caraNam 2    mandaragiri sindhuvinoLamrta tandu bhaktariguNalenda
    caraNam 3    bhUmiya kadda ghaLana mardisi A mahA satiyaLa tanda
    caraNam 4    duruLa hiraNyakana karuLa baridu tanna koraLoLagiTTa bageyinda
    caraNam 5    puTTanAgi mahikoTTa baliya tale meTTi tuLida bageyinda
    caraNam 6    dhAtriyoLu muni putranAgi bandu kSatriyarellara konda
    caraNam 7    maDadigAgi saragaDalane kaTTi hiDidu rAvaNana konda
    caraNam 8    gOkuladi huTTi gOvgaLa kAida gOpAlakrSNa tA banda
    caraNam 9    chaladali tripurara satiyara vratada bhalavanaLida bageyinda
  caraNam 10    dhareyoLu parama nIcara savare kudureyErida kali canda
  caraNam 11    dOSadUra shrI purandara viTTala pOSa bhakta suvrnda
